page.title: 10Mrs.Roberts-Bookbinder.
page.content: There is one old craft still being carried on in Cheriton.Five of us from Cheriton School visited Mrs.Roberts,who is a bookbinder. Mrs.Roberts did four years training at Southampton University before she got her bookbinders certificate.We saw many beautiful books she had made.We saw that each book is made up of lots of sections each section being of three or four pages.A special sewing frame is used to sew lots of sections together at the spine of the book. We all made bookmarks with our name on in gold.We had to put each letter on individually,using real gold foil.The bookmakers tool has to be heated first and pushed down very hard on the foil to leave a gold letter behind.
